description: The Ukrainian leader says he agreed to one of the gunman's demands in order to free 13 people.
title: Ukraine hostages freed after President Zelensky plugs Joaquin Phoenix film
title_page: Ukraine hostages freed after President Zelensky plugs Joaquin Phoenix film - BBC News
maintext: Mr Zelensky stressed his most important aim throughout the ordeal was to ensure there was no loss of life. "We are not fighting for popularity ratings, we are fighting for life. This is the primary value for me."
